metadata.title: CVE-2019-25155 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: DOMPurify before 1.0.11 allows reverse tabnabbing indemos/hooks-target-blank-demo.html because links lack a 'rel="noopenernoreferrer"' attribute.

criterions.comment: dompurify.js: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
